about_the_game:
If you enjoyed the base game, here's a chance to support the developers while also donating to a great cause.

The features of this donation DLC are thus:
  • A new scene containing new dialogue options and chances to change your status with characters
  • 10% goes towards St. Jude Children's Research Hospital

About St. Jude

The mission of St. Jude Children’s Research Hospital is to advance cures, and means of prevention, for pediatric catastrophic diseases through research and treatment. No child is denied treatment based on race, religion or a family's ability to pay.
